text: George Goodchild (1875 – 1927) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1875 births Category:1927 deaths Category:People from the City of Sunderland Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:Burton Swifts F.C. players Category:Jarrow F.C. players Category:Whitburn F.C. players Category:Ashington A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: George Goodchild (footballer)
